DOC.brief_summary: This study compare safety effectiveness PF-05280586 versus rituximab-EU patient CD20-positive , low tumor burden follicular lymphoma . The primary hypothesis test study effectiveness PF-05280586 , measure Overall Response Rate , similar rituximab-EU .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Of PF-05280586 ( Rituximab-Pfizer ) Or MabTheraÂ® ( Rituximab-EU ) For The First-Line Treatment Of Patients With CD20-Positive , Low Tumor Burden , Follicular Lymphoma ( REFLECTIONS B328-06 )
DOC.criteria: Confirmed diagnosis low tumor burden , CD20positive follicular lymphoma Ann Arbor Stage II , III , IV Not candidate treatment rituximab singleagent Evidence transformation high grade diffuse large Bcell lymphoma Any previous systemic therapy Bcell NHL , include chemotherapy , immunotherapy , steroids Any prior treatment rituximab Active , uncontrolled infection
